name: Snoova
Lore: 'Perhaps the only true Wookiee bounty hunter in the galaxy. Even high ranking members of the Alliance fear him. Favors a vibro-ax for his personal weapon.',
Text: 'Deploys -3 to same site as any smuggler or bounty. During your deploy phase, a Vibro-Ax may deploy for free on Snoova from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. When Snoova excludes a target with a Vibro-Ax, he may capture target instead.',
